scripts.build:frontend: bun run build:frontend:assets && bun run build:frontend:ts
scripts.build:frontend:assets: mkdir -p public/css public/js && cp src/frontend/index.html public/ && cp -r src/frontend/css/* public/css/
scripts.dev: bun run build && bunx wrangler pages dev public
scripts.deploy: bun run build && bunx wrangler pages deploy public
